p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Get the value of a parameter.
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Retrieves the value of a system parameter based on its name. This is typically used for environment-specific parameters such as API endpoints, API keys, etc.

In a Service App, the value is read from the configuration file.
In a UI App, the value can come from either the configuration file or the URL (e.g., &my_parameter=my_value).

For example, the parameter sc.app contains the application identifier.
